snippet: Judicial authorities in Bahrain nullified the convictions and prison terms given to 20 medical workers last week by a court prosecuting cases arising from civil unrest in the country.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: Judicial authorities in Bahrain nullified the convictions and prison terms given to 20 medical workers last week by a court prosecuting cases arising from civil unrest in the country.

headline.main: Bahrain Orders Retrials for Medical Workers
headline.seo: Bahrain Voids Medical Workers’ Jail Terms, Ordering Retrials
